channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement, 11th August
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 09/08/25 13:02 • Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: Come to repair pavement last week but left white stans on driveway wont come off with water can someone come back to remove it please • What action (if any) would you like us to take? To clean it off my drive looks bad
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public footpath trip hazards, 11th August
item.description:
This public footpath (between Dawsons' Estate and Cityview Court) is fairly inaccessible and likely to be a trip hazard due to the growth of self-seeded trees and general overgrowth. Many people use this footpath as a shortcut from Overguill road to access Dawson's Hill, Donkey Alley or Dunstans road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dawson's Hill Footpath (Donkey Alley to Overhill Road), East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
